name: Avoiding Disaster
description:
After pressing the doomsday button, humanity is long gone, and now our furry and not-so-furry friends have reached for space in search of a better home. As the colonization business grew, companies started to compete to show that they could build a shelter to resist any disaster. And of course, it's up to you as their employee to do all the hard work.

Avoiding Disaster is a multiplayer party game about building structures to gain points and using those same structures to hide or escape from disasters in order to keep those same points.  The game originated from a student project and is still in development, but we've decided to release an early version to get community feedback as we keep creating and balancing new mechanics and stages.

Currently, the game supports LAN and online play for up to 8 players using a VPN application like Radmin or Hamachi.

We recommend using Radmin as it is quite easy to configure.

All feedback is appreciated and we look forward to showing you what's next for the project!
